summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5853 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Cowen's University Park Addition, being the alleys in the block bounded by East 62nd Street, East 61st Street, Roosevelt Way and 12th Avenue Northeast; and certain other alley and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77185, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
